titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the raising of money to pay the charge of the fortifications and guards, and for other necessary uses for the safety of the city and parts adjacent within the lines of communication and weekly bills of mortality : die Martis, 3. Decemb. 1644.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Martis, 3. Decemb. 1644.
